Temperatura din bucatarie s-a modificat in felul urmator: 
[10.0, 10.1, 10.19, 10.3, 10.39, 10.49, 10.59, 10.69, 10.79, 10.89, 10.99, 11.09, 11.19, 11.29, 11.39, 11.49, 11.59, 11.69, 11.79, 11.89, 11.99, 12.09, 12.19, 12.29, 12.39, 12.49, 12.59, 12.69, 12.79, 12.89, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99, 12.99]
